definition: to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation

sentences.english: The rabbit, though it chews the cud, does not have a split hoof; it is unclean for you.
sentences.chinese: 豬因爲蹄分兩瓣，卻不倒嚼，就與你們不潔淨。

sentences.english: The pig is also unclean; although it has a split hoof, it does not chew the cud.
sentences.chinese: 豬因爲是分蹄卻不倒嚼，就與你們不潔淨。

sentences.english: And the pig, though it has a split hoof completely divided, does not chew the cud; it is unclean for you.
sentences.chinese: 豬，因爲蹄分兩瓣，卻不倒嚼，就與你們不潔淨。

definition: (of livestock) to fatten up/to put on weight
to forage/to gather for eating/to pick and eat
to loosen a yoke/to remove harness (from beast of burden)
